verses.roman:
ādānaṁ pārijātasya
sudharmāyāḥ surālayāt
rukmiṇyā haraṇaṁ yuddhe
pramathya dviṣato hareḥ

synonyms: ādānam—the receiving; pārijātasya—of the pārijāta tree; sudharmāyāḥ—of the Sudharmā assembly hall; sura-ālayāt—from the abode of the demigods; rukmiṇyāḥ—of Rukmiṇī; haraṇam—the kidnapping; yuddhe—in battle; pramathya—defeating; dviṣataḥ—His rivals; hareḥ—by Lord Hari.
translation: This work also describes how Lord Kṛṣṇa brought from heaven the pārijāta tree and the Sudharmā assembly hall, and how He kidnapped Rukmiṇī by defeating all His rivals in battle.
